value_claims.claim_title: Website homepage redesign increased flight search by 10%
value_claims.claim_description: Data-driven redesign of Virgin Atlantic's website homepage resulted in a 10% increase in the number of people searching for flights.
value_claims.source_quote: Redesigning the website homepage, which boosted the number of people searching for flights by 10%.
value_claims.quote_location: How Virgin Atlantic Uses Data Insights section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Data analytics insights contributed to informing the redesign decisions, though the claim does not specify AI was the sole driver.

value_claims.claim_title: Personalized experiences boosted acquisition target by 50%
value_claims.claim_description: Delivering personalized experiences from booking to landing using data insights increased Virgin Atlantic's acquisition target by 50%.
value_claims.source_quote: Delivering personalised experiences from the moment passengers book to the point the wheels hit the runway, which boosted Virgin Atlantic's acquisition target by 50%.
value_claims.quote_location: How Virgin Atlantic Uses Data Insights section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Personalization is a core AI/ML capability, directly attributable to data analytics and AI-driven recommendation systems.

value_claims.claim_title: Campaign resulted in 14% uplift in passenger consideration
value_claims.claim_description: The 'I Am What I Am' campaign, informed by data insights, resulted in a 14% uplift in passenger consideration and 10,000 applications for 800 crew roles.
value_claims.source_quote: Creating the 'I Am What I Am' campaign, which resulted in 14% uplift in passenger consideration, and a surge of 10,000 applications to fill 800 frontline crew roles.
value_claims.quote_location: How Virgin Atlantic Uses Data Insights section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Data insights contributed to campaign design and targeting, though AI's specific role is not detailed.

value_claims.claim_title: Copilot saves 1-2 hours per user per week
value_claims.claim_description: Rolling out 300 Copilot licenses saved each user 1-2 hours per week by summarizing meetings within Teams, freeing them for more meaningful work.
value_claims.source_quote: Rolling out 300 licenses for Copilot, saving each user 1-2 hours per week by summarising meetings within Teams, which freed them to focus on more meaningful work.
value_claims.quote_location: How Virgin Atlantic Uses Data Insights section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft Copilot is an AI-powered tool directly responsible for the time savings through automated meeting summarization.

value_claims.claim_title: 41% of apprentices had job move or promotion
value_claims.claim_description: 41% of apprentices at Virgin Atlantic had a job move or promotion during or within one year of completing their data and AI skills development programme.
value_claims.source_quote: 41% of apprentices have had a job move or promotion during or within one year of completing their programme.
value_claims.quote_location: How Virgin Atlantic has Secured Data & AI Skills in Abundance section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: This measures the impact of AI skills training programs rather than direct AI system deployment, providing organizational context.

value_claims.claim_title: AI-powered digital Concierge launched for personalized travel planning
value_claims.claim_description: Virgin Atlantic launched an AI-powered digital Concierge service using OpenAI technology to provide personalized travel recommendations and support across flights, holidays, and customer queries.
value_claims.source_quote: The digital Concierge utilises advanced AI technology to learn traveller preferences and offer tailored recommendations for flights, holidays, and more.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The Concierge is explicitly powered by OpenAI technology and uses AI to learn preferences and provide personalized recommendations.

value_claims.claim_title: AI implementation in pricing and revenue management
value_claims.claim_description: Virgin Atlantic leverages Fetcherr's AI solutions including Large Market Model for pricing and revenue management to enhance operational efficiency and profitability.
value_claims.source_quote: Virgin Atlantic is leveraging Fetcherr's AI solutions to not only enhance day-to-day operations but also to drive strategic decisions that will define the future of air travel.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Fetcherr's AI solutions are directly applied to pricing and revenue management operations with measurable impacts on efficiency and profitability.
